channel.title: NerdsRepublic
channel.description:
# NerdsRepublic
![Sample|500x500, 100%](upload://Lp6uuc2jSEgYMGylOvp8Tiz53z.png)
> Nerds Republic is the first collection of 10,000 unique characters living on the Radix DLT. Each digital Nerd represents an identity and grants full access to the owner within the newly formed Republic. **Price for each NFT**: 150 XRD **Links:** * [Website](https://nerdsrepublic.net/) * [How to mint](https://nerdsrepublic.net/#mint) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nerds_republic) * [Discord](https://discord.gg/vuFPcaBGys)

item.title: NerdsRepublic

item.description:
NerdsRepublic

Nerds Republic is the first collection of 10,000 unique characters living on the Radix DLT. Each digital Nerd represents an identity and grants full access to the owner within the newly formed Republic.

Price for each NFT: 150 XRD
